scripts.deploy:studio: npm run prepare:network && graph auth --studio $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY && graph deploy --studio $REPO
scripts.deploy:hosted: npm run prepare:network && graph auth --product hosted-service $GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN && graph deploy --product hosted-service $REPO
scripts.prepare:network: mustache config/$NETWORK.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:goerli-ci: mustache config/goerli-ci.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-local-ci: echo | graph deploy aelinprotocol/e2e-subgraph --debug --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020
scripts.deploy-ci: npm run prepare:goerli-ci && npm run create-local-ci && npm run deploy-local-ci
